definition: to appeal for justice/to demand redress for a grievance
old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
injustice/grievance/wrong

sentences.english: Never avenge yourselves, but leave room for the wrath of God;
sentences.chinese: 不要自己申冤，寧可讓步，聽憑主怒。

sentences.english: Nobody could redress the grievance for him.
